## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_SIZE" property

Emitted when the size of an emitted particle is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_SIZE]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        size: number;
    };
```
